title: Amy is a tiger
creator_credit: Keith Hall and Cameracraft Film Productions
brief_description: A promotional film for industrial development in Queensland. A Canadian, visiting Queensland to report on business prospects and industrialization, charters Amy, an elderly Tiger Moth, to take him to the industrially important areas of the State.
description: A promotional film for industrial development in Queensland. A Canadian, visiting Queensland to report on business prospects and industrialization, charters Amy, an elderly Tiger Moth, to take him to the industrially important areas of the State.
